visualization_prompt: Generate a column chart showing comparative wheat export values across top producer countries using categorical ranking
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains univariate categorical data showing wheat export values for 10 countries. As primary source data from industry reports is used, values maintain real-world ordinal relationships with Russia (6.4B) to Kazakhstan (1B) showing exponential decay pattern. The column chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating gridlines and legend while direct data labeling preserves Cairo's principle of proportional ink. Column ranking visually encodes the exponential distribution (μ=3.11B, σ=2.23B) through descending bar heights, with Russia-US-Canada forming a high-value cluster containing 50% of total represented exports.
